text.text: This is one of the most important parts of your emails. Sure you can send an email for informational purposes. But, nothing you do as a brand can not carry your selling proposition. It is essential to make the receiver do something with what you are sending them. It can be signing up, upgrading, buying, subscribing or anything tall. You’re intentional behind your campaign should translate into a CTA and be placed on email. A button that says ‘Buy Now’, ‘See more’, ‘Take the tour’, ‘Get started’, are all examples of a CTA.
